data.question: What is the title of the article?
data.answer: High-Efficiency Lithium-Ion Transport in a Porous Coordination Chain-Based Hydrogen-Bonded Framework

data.question: Who are the authors of the article?
data.answer: Zongsu Han, Runhao Zhang, Jialong Jiang, Zhonghang Chen, Youxuan Ni, Weiwei Xie, Jun Xu, Zhen Zhou, Jun Chen, Peng Cheng, and Wei Shi

data.question: What is the main component of the SSE mentioned in the article?
What is the Li+ conductivity of Li@NKU-1000 at 25 °C?
What is the electrochemical window of the Li@NKU-1000-based SSE?
What is the Li+ transfer number of the Li@NKU-1000-based SSE?
What is the activation energy for ionic conduction in Li@NKU-1000?
What is the critical current density (CCD) of the Li@NKU-1000-based SSE?
What is the capacity retention of the solid-state battery with Li@NKU-1000-based SSE after 500 cycles?
What is the Young's modulus of Li@NKU-1000?
Is the Li@NKU-1000-based SSE flame retardant?
Does the Li@NKU-1000-based SSE exhibit a higher ionic conductivity compared to the PVDF-HFP/LiTFSI solid electrolyte?
Is the electrochemical stability window of the Li@NKU-1000-based membrane lower than 5.0 V?
Can the Li@NKU-1000-based SSE operate over a wide temperature range?
Does the Li@NKU-1000-based SSE suppress lithium dendrite growth?
Is the Li@NKU-1000-based SSE based on a two-dimensional framework?
Does the Li@NKU-1000-based SSE have a Li+ transfer number lower than 0.5?
Is the Young's modulus of NKU-1000 higher than that of Li@NKU-1000?
What is the role of Li@NKU-1000 in the solid-state electrolyte?
data.answer: Li@NKU-1000 serves as the main component of the SSE, providing high Li+ conductivity, flame retardancy, and suppressing lithium dendrite growth.

data.question: How does the Li@NKU-1000-based SSE achieve high ionic conductivity?
data.answer: The high ionic conductivity is achieved through the porous coordination chain-based hydrogen-bonded framework of Li@NKU-1000, which contains arrayed electronegative sites for efficient Li+ transport.
